title: ESG financing in India ahead of target, says DBS
description: DBS Bank's ESG finance book in India has surpassed its 60% growth target for 2024, ranking among the top three markets for the bank. With a significant increase in ESG financing, particularly in renewable energy, telecommunications, and agriculture, DBS aims to expand further.
